PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AnalogInput
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Defines the characteristics of an analog input.

PropertyDef.Name: HighLimit
PropertyDef.Definition: The high limit value for the analog input.

PropertyDef.Name: LowLimit
PropertyDef.Definition: The low limit value for the analog input.

PropertyDef.Name: Deadband
PropertyDef.Definition: The deadband value for the analog input.

PropertyDef.Name: HighLimitEnable
PropertyDef.Definition: Is high limit validation enabled (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: LowLimitEnable
PropertyDef.Definition: Is low limit validation enabled (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: EventEnable
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration that defines the type of event enabling

PropertyDef.Name: NotifyType
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration that defines the notification type
